unnormalised: Okay, here's a Quora post on Exam Prep Apps:
normalised: **Exam Prep Apps: Lifesavers or Just Another Distraction? (Education Technology)**

unnormalised: **Exam Prep Apps: Lifesavers or Just Another Distraction? (Education Technology)**

normalised: So, exams are looming (like always, right?) and I'm drowning in N C E R T textbooks and past papers. Thought I'd ask: what are your go-to exam prep apps? I'm studying for my engineering entrance, specifically focusing on I I T J E E mains.

unnormalised: So, exams are looming (like always, right?) and I'm drowning in NCERT textbooks and past papers. Thought I'd ask: what are your go-to exam prep apps? I'm studying for my engineering entrance, specifically focusing on IIT JEE mains.
normalised: I've tried a few, like the one my coaching class, F I I T J E E, recommended, but honestly, sometimes I feel like I spend more time fiddling with the app than actually studying! It's got these daily challenges at five p.m. which I mostly skip because chai time is sacred.

unnormalised: I've tried a few, like the one my coaching class, FIITJEE, recommended, but honestly, sometimes I feel like I spend more time fiddling with the app than actually studying! It's got these daily challenges at 17:00 hrs which I mostly skip because chai time is sacred.
normalised: Seriously though, which apps have actually helped you guys improve your scores? I'm looking for something that covers concepts clearly and offers good practice questions, maybe even mock tests similar to the actual exam format. Preferably something with a decent price point (we're talking middle-class budget here, okay?).

unnormalised: Seriously though, which apps have actually helped you guys improve your scores? I'm looking for something that covers concepts clearly and offers good practice questions, maybe even mock tests similar to the actual exam format. Preferably something with a decent price point (we're talking middle-class budget here, okay?).
normalised: Also, any apps that are particularly good for specific subjects? I'm really struggling with organic chemistry.

unnormalised: Also, any apps that are particularly good for specific subjects? I'm really struggling with organic chemistry.
normalised: My friend, Priya from D P S, swears by this app called "ExamGuru", but I haven't tried it yet. Is it any good? My board exams, the Class twelfth C B S E, is on fifteenth March two thousand and twenty four so I'm trying to buckle down since twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty four. Any tips for staying focused while using these apps? And are there any hidden gems out there? Someone told me about a quiz app for competitive exams but forgot the name!

unnormalised: My friend, Priya from DPS, swears by this app called "ExamGuru", but I haven't tried it yet. Is it any good? My board exams, the Class 12th CBSE, is on 15/03/2024 so I'm trying to buckle down since 26/01/2024. Any tips for staying focused while using these apps? And are there any hidden gems out there? Someone told me about a quiz app for competitive exams but forgot the name!
normalised: Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated! Let's ace these exams, people! Good luck to everyone grinding for their future, remember the nineteen ninety one reforms!

unnormalised: Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated! Let's ace these exams, people! Good luck to everyone grinding for their future, remember the 1991 reforms!
